channel.title: Dragon Claws Special Makes Me Disconnect
channel.description: Dragon Claws Special Makes My client Disconnect. Anyone Know How to Fix?

item.title: Dragon Claws Special Makes Me Disconnect
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

ok new problem, the special dosnt work on players.

this is the code i got

public boolean process() { if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamgNPC(30); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } } if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamg(25); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } }

Read full topic
item.source: Dragon Claws Special Makes Me Disconnect
